topic: Movie Workflow Series ("Tv series Without a Trace explorative search")

goals.1: Identify the BGP for television series
goals.2: Return the number of seasons and episodes per season of the tv series (the result set must be triples of season IRI, label and #episodes).
goals.3: Get the number of episodes in which the cast members played a role. Who are the most present actors? (the result set must be a list of triples actor/actress IRI, label and #episodes)
goals.4: Check who is the actor who acted in more films while working on "Without a Trace" (the result set must be a list of triples actor/actress IRI, label and #films).
goals.5: Compare Without a Trace with the tv series "Cold Case" in terms of number of seasons, episods and cast members (the result set must be two elements -one for each tv series- of tv series IRI, label, #seasons, #episodes and #cast members).
goals.6: Return the actors who are members of the cast of Without a Trace have [Kavin Bacon number](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Six_Degrees_of_Kevin_Bacon#:~:text=Kevin%20Bacon%20himself%20has%20a,Bacon%20number%20is%20N%2B1.) equal to 2 (the result set must be a list of couples actor/actress IRI and label).
goals.7: Consider the actors who are members of the cast of Cold Case. Amongst the tv series which these actors acted return only those which received more than 2 awards (the result set must be triples of tv series IRI, label, #awards won).

name: 95c1679c0f

1.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?name WHERE { wd:Q826477 ?p ?obj . ?p sc:name ?name. } LIMIT 20
